data.title: ECU Football
data.text:
The introduction of new coach Scotty Montgomery running through the Undaunted ECU slogan was the exciting kickoff of this football season. The city of Greenville NC and its crazed fans truly support this team, win, lose or draw.

So far, this season has been a roller coaster ride. Mostly downs but the coach, new quarter and players have shined with a few big home wins.

data.title: ECU open house
data.text: Great visit to ECU for the Fall open house. The students that represented the various programs represented the university very well. Great first impression for myself and my daughter.

data.title: Great campus
data.text: I was a patient of ECU School of Dental Medicine. The instructors are very knowledgeable and the students eager to learn. Recommend it to all people who want quality dental work at cheap prices.

data.title: Great ECU stay
data.text: When you are in town for an ECU event, this is a fantastic, clean, reasonable place to stay.  Staff is friendly and helpful and you're close to pretty much all ECU has to offer.

data.title: 2 alumni in family
data.text: Great bus service provided by University for off campus students - safe and prompt. Easy walking main campus. Lots of dining options; great bookstore on campus. Great recreation options offered.

data.title: College Mom
data.text: We have loved every trip to ECU. Greenville has so much to do, great shopping and dining. We spend a lot time in Greenville since our daughter lives here.

data.title: Visiting for Genealogy research, excellent time
data.text: Staff and students were wonderful to us as visitors. Truly a beautiful  place for higher education. Could not be better ... love to visit again.

data.title: Awesome Campus - very safe and nice layout
data.text: We had a great time here visiting the campus and I can't wait to come back for game day!  It's a nice campus that's a perfect size with many offerings.  I highly recommend a visit and enjoying the Pirates!

data.title: Great Looking Campus
data.text: East Carolina University is a great looking campus with modern facilities and a vibrant student body.

data.title: Excellent Dental School
data.text: Impressive facilities at the new dental school.  Very beautiful and state of the art facility.  Easily accessible with excellent parking areas.

data.title: Beautiful campus. Really top-notch!
data.text: I was pleasantly surprised how lovely the East Carolina campus is. Both the buildings and the grounds. It's a large, attractive campus.

data.title: College Visit
data.text: Beautiful lush campus, large but not too large.  Students, staff, and locals are very respectful and friendly.  Can't wait to see the new Student Union and football stadium upgrade

data.title: A great place where passion and education make a great mix.
data.text: This university has been a part of my life since birth.  I have made livelong friends and even met my wife because of ECU.  Everyone involved with ECU is passionate (or becomes very passionate) because of all of the things that ECU provides nationally and especially regionally to Eastern North Carolina.  I will always be thankful to have been a part of and still be a part of ECU and would encourage anyone considering a university to attend or work at to give ECU a look.

data.title: Academia with a side of crazy!
data.text: Between my wife and I, we have five degrees from ECU.  Depending on the program, classes can be tough but the environment is great!

data.title: Lady Pirates Stadium
data.text: Grandaughters softball team got to play in the Lady Pirates Stadium, very nice facility, hopefully some on our team will get to play there in a few years.

data.title: Very Upbeat
data.text: Enjoyed touring the campus.   Shopping at the bookstore was a treat, very well run and organized.  Very crowded but well organized.....plenty of parking available.  All in all a beautiful campus but unfortunately in August it is just too hot to get to see as much as you hoped

data.title: ECU
data.text: My husband is a grad and my daughter is a current student.  The size of the university is nice--not too big or too small.  Lots of different majors.  Small town community which is all behind the university.  Great athletics.  Offers chance to be a part of fine arts (theater, symphony, etc).

data.title: Sup Dogs: the best source of Southern Comfort
data.text:
I started going to Sup Dogs over the summer, after thinking for a while about seeing what they have to offer. The only regret I have now is not trying them out sooner. The atmosphere is laid back, the food is tasty (love the Hawaiian Luau Combo), and the staff (especially those lovely ladies, Megan and Sarah) is awesome. 

My best source of Southern Comfort doesn't come from a shot glass, but Sup Dogs. It roxxx!

data.title: I live nearby, love the campus, love the spirit
data.text: ECU is one of the most 'spirited' schools I've ever known.  Something of an underdog, they consistently outperform.  Growing campus, wonderful community support, and room to grow in a medium sized city.  As a VT grad, I've admired their spirit for 30 years.

data.title: ECU is an excellent choice!
data.text: ECU is an excellent choice for a college education and a great value as well (even for out of state students).  We are happy to say our daughter will be a Pirate this fall!
